text: The 1899–1900 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team represented Yale University in intercollegiate basketball during the 1899–1900 season. The team finished the season with a 9–6 record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==References== Category:Yale Bulldogs men's basketball seasons Yale Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team
title: 1899–1900 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team
